name: Line Simulator (itch)
description:
Line Simulator is a game made for the Maine Video Game Devs Holiday Jam, in which the theme was "Mundane." The game had to be made in 1 week. Our team decided to make Line Simulator. Players are waiting in line for the latest game console, the Gamestation 6, but they must wait in line. With the line ever creeping forward, players must perform tasks or get kicked out, such as holding stacks of boxes, holding onto someone's dogs, and more. With an estimated playtime of 10 minutes, can you get the Gamestation, or will you die trying?

Team:

Gavin Chambers: Lead Design

Josh Libby: Lead Programmer

Kevin Ingalls: Programmer

Logan Cropper: Lead Sound Design
